sentences.en: Even President Obama's mother-in-law has agreed to leave Chicago and into the White House to help care for her granddaughters.
sentences.cn: 甚至连奥巴马总统的岳母也同意离开芝加哥，进入白宫，帮助照顾她的外孙女们。

sentences.en: Back home, I see mother-in-law is boiling dumplings.
sentences.cn: 回到家，我看到婆婆正在煮饺子。

sentences.en: They sweat in a strange kitchen, take care of a bossy mother-in-law and see their husbands only for a few weeks each year.
sentences.cn: 她们在陌生的厨房里挥汗如雨，照顾专横的婆婆，每年只有几周时间能见到自己的丈夫。
